title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc outjar to create a jar file, the resulting file does not contain the expected META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: Currently, when using the ajc outjar command to create a jar file, the resulting file does not contain the expected META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The expected behavior is that when using ajc outjar, the resulting file should be a valid jar file and include the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Compile and build a Java project using ajc outjar. 
2. Verify that the resulting jar file does not contain the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file.
